message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Let's split the difference a bit closer to the middle. Time is money!
Getting closer to the middle ground. Don't let inflation eat away our money!
This is getting ridiculous. Take this slightly better offer before inflation makes it pointless!
Inflation is hurting both of us. Meet me at the actual middle ground.
Last offer.  Take it or leave a pitiful amount on the table after the next round of inflation.
